caption: Incident Creation
description: Incident creation events report the creation of an incident as a result of detections and/or analytics.
name: incident_create

creator.description: The creator of the rule that triggered the incident.

data.description: The additional data that is associated with the incident.

desc.description: The description of the rule that created the incident.

detection_type.description: The originating technology that triggered the incident creation.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the incident.

recommended_action.description: A description of the recommended step(s) to take in order to resolve the incident.

rule.description: The rule that triggered the incident.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the incident.
